title: A facile strategy for the preparation of polylactide nano-microspheres with enhanced stereo-complexations
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30192-30200
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04919E, Paper
Open Access

Ming Hua, Ying Pan, Changmei Jiang, Peiyan Yu, Xingang Li, Yao Gao, Sijun Xu, Gangwei Pan
Stereo-complexed polylactide (sc-PLA) nano-microspheres using phase separation method exhibited regular shape, good sphericity and uniform particle size, and high crystallinity.
